blogPost.excerpt: Litmaps lets you navigate the scientific literature with interactive visualisations of citation networks. Create a literature map, discover new articles, and export your discoveries, to advance your research project.
blogPost.body: Litmaps lets you navigate the scientific literature with interactive visualisations of citation networks. Create a literature map, discover new articles, and export your discoveries, to advance your research project.
blogPost.title: Litmaps - Search scientific literature with interactive citations map
blogPost.author: Axton Pitt

localize.description: Litmaps让你通过交互式可视化的引用网络来浏览科学文献。创建一个文献地图，发现新的文章，并导出你的发现，以推进你的研究项目。
localize.tagline: 用交互式引文地图搜索科学文献

localize.description: Litmaps讓你通過交互式可視化的引用網絡來瀏覽科學文獻。創建一個文獻地圖，發現新的文章，並導出你的發現，以推進你的研究項目。
localize.tagline: 用交互式引文地圖搜索科學文獻

previous.excerpt: The fastest way to create screenshots of your app for product pages on Apple App Store, Google Play Store, Microsoft Store, etc.
previous.title: Screen - Screenshot creator for product pages on app stores

localize.description: 最快的方式为你的应用创建屏幕截图，用于苹果应用商店、Google Play商店、微软商店等的产品页面。
localize.tagline: 应用商店产品页面的截图生成器

localize.description: 最快的方式爲你的應用創建屏幕截圖，用於蘋果應用商店、Google Play商店、微軟商店等的產品頁面。
localize.tagline: 應用商店產品頁面的截圖生成器

next.excerpt: Scale database resources in and out on demand to match application requirements and traffic so that you pay only for what you use. Runs on every cloud with developer GraphQL, REST, JSON, CQL APIs. $25 usage credits per month.
next.title: Astra Serverless Database - An on-demand database for supercharging your next project

localize.description: 按需扩展数据库资源，以满足应用需求和流量，因此您只需为您使用的资源付费。在每个云上运行，并提供开发者GraphQL、REST、JSON、CQL API。每月25美元的使用额度。
localize.tagline: 按需数据库，为您的下一个项目增压
